name: Captain Armstrong
description:
Enter Captain Armstrong

The captain was attacked by the Ushubushus from the planet Wusubusubusu. Her ship was destroyed and now she needs to gather back materials from her ship to repair and assemble it back. Only by riding comets through space she'll get a chance to get back home safe and sound.

Instructions

Use [D] to rotate to the right and find materials.

Use [A] to jump to the nearest comet. 

When piloting your ship, you can use [A] to stir in the oher direction.

                                                                                                                            

You'll need to get bolts, batteries and panels to repair the ship.

                                 

Also get heart cotainers to recover HP

Avoid as much as you can any Ushubushu.

Once you collected all needed parts, head towards your ship ir order to board it. Then, escape from the emergin black holes into the portal that will take you and Captain Armstron home!

Programming by Rafael Comonfort

Music, SFX and Graphics by https://www.amirbayareh.com

Animations and Character Design by https://www.instagram.com/lady_waffles/
